visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a line chart with the following specifications: Chart type: line, Chart title: Monthly Sales Data, Axes and labels styling: Use a dark blue color (#003366) for the title and labels, with a font size of 14px for the title and 12px for the labels. Data series: Include one series named 'Sales' with the data provided in the JavaScript code. Custom colors: Use a light blue color (#ADD8E6) for the line. Additional configurations: Set the chart background color to a light yellow (#FCFFC5), configure the legend to be vertically aligned, with a white background, and positioned at the top-left corner with some margin. Also, include a tooltip that displays the series name and the data point's category and value.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a line chart titled 'Monthly Sales Data'. The chart's background color is set to a light yellow (#FCFFC5), and the line representing the 'Sales' data series is colored in light blue (#ADD8E6). The title and axis labels are styled with a dark blue color (#003366) and specific font sizes: 14px for the title and 12px for the labels. The legend is positioned vertically at the top-left corner with a white background and some margin. The tooltip displays the series name and the data point's category and value when hovered over the chart. This configuration ensures a clear and visually appealing presentation of the monthly sales data.
